Module edu.citadel.cprl
Package edu.citadel.cprl.ast

Interface VariableDecl

All Known Implementing Classes:
ParameterDecl, SingleVarDecl
public sealed interface VariableDecl permits SingleVarDecl, ParameterDecl
Interface for a variable declaration, which can be either a "single" variable declaration or a parameter declaration.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    int
    getRelAddr()
    Returns the relative address (offset) of the variable declared with this declaration.
    ScopeLevel
    getScopeLevel()
    Returns the scope level for this declaration.
    int
    getSize()
    Returns the size (number of bytes) of the variable declared with this declaration.
    Type
    getType()
    Returns the type of this declaration.
    void
    setRelAddr(int relAddr)
    Sets the relative address (offset) of the variable declared with this declaration.
